Reviews.Title: Great little phone, for the non-iPhone types
Reviews.Author: Candace Drimmer "a.k.a. Candi Boggs"
Reviews.Content: Given we can't get a signal from AT&T; (other than on the front porch), we went with this little number from T-Mobile. Love it. Not quite as intuitive as the iPhone, but mostly good. Has some issues with freezing--remove the battery and it recycles--but reliable and friendly.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Paul Pellegrini
Reviews.Content: used to replace the same model, been very happy with the performance. Happy with this model phone and all samsungs I have had

Reviews.Title: Is This Phone Truly 4G? I Don't Care Any More.
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: New MessageThis Is The Best Phone I Ever Had. I Will Buy Two Of Them. I Don't Care If Is Truly 4G. Th Internet In This Phone It's Really Fast. It's A Great Phone. I Recommended.Old Messageyou can take a﻿ screenshot where the phone say that is connected to HSPA+ or HSPA network type. you have to go to settings, about phone, status, network type. and there tell you what network type you are connected. i have this phone and the only networks i have is GPRS, EDGE, UMTS, HSDPA. i wants to see if this phone is truly 4g.

Reviews.Title: It has its ups and downs
Reviews.Author: Miles
Reviews.Content: I love the phone itself but sometimes it randomly cuts off or it wont recognize my sim card and I have to restart it a few times before I can text or make calls. It doesn't freeze frequently but it does freeze up enough to be a nuisance. The camera doesn't have a flash but that really wasn't important to me. Battery life is OK. This could be a 5 star if the phones problems weren't so annoying

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: yesi
Reviews.Content: This phone dosent work I have to ask someone else to charge the battery for me.....I had for less the a month and it roung so fast

Reviews.Title: I Love My Galaxy S 4g!!!
Reviews.Author: Monte
Reviews.Content: I love my phone! Don't forget to reboot your phone once a week to keep it working smoothly with no stutters or freezes and make sure you use a 32 g sd card. There are so many ways to customize this phone with phone features and apps that you will want to have the whole capacity of memory available. Its not likely you will use the entire 32 gigs but its so cool to see the face of iPhone users when they ask u how much memory your Galaxy S has!

Reviews.Title: nice screen but everything else is sub par.  too bad it looks good but does not perform
Reviews.Author: fanpro "fanpro"
Reviews.Content: Samsung did a very poor job with this phone.  slow, bloated os.  crashes.  reboots for no reason. drops calls.  looks cool but fails way to often.  Be smart buy: get a Nokia a windows phone and forget Samsung and goog/droid.

Reviews.Title: I do like the rest of the fonctions
Reviews.Author: famara djiba
Reviews.Content: This phone thas not have a flash in the Camera.I couldn't take any picture at night.I do like the rest of the fonctio.s

Reviews.Title: Samsung GALAXY S 4G Android T959V
Reviews.Author: Douglas P. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I am using this phone with the DailyRoads Voyager app as a cheap dashboard cam. I bought this for two features: the ability to record in 720P and that it accepts microSD cards (of which I am using a 32GB one). The video quality during the daytime is good enough so that license plates are clearly legible, although I cannot say the same for night time quality (a problem inherent to most cameras).To speed up the GPS signal acquisition, I'd highly recommend putting a SIM card into the phone as it is very difficult for the phone to determine it's location upon power up without one (even in a clear area).

Reviews.Title: Good, inexpensive smartphone
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I had the same phone and we ordered this one for my husband. He wanted a smartphone, though he hardly uses most of the features, so we didn't feel the need to buy a more updated model for $500. This one is great. The touchscreen is accurate and responsive. The camera is more than decent. We both use ours frequently for sending photos to friends/family, taking pictures of PowerPoint slides in class, etc. The phone is user-friendly and I'd definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Louise Binion "Louise"
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Galaxy 2 has WIFI and is super easy to use...  I love this cell phone.  Taking pictures and a videos is super easy.  Plus I have plenty of memory with 32mg bit card.

Reviews.Title: decent budget phone
Reviews.Author: Bo Peng
Reviews.Content: decently fast, easily rooted for CM. good backup or travel phone. Screen is a little lower res in comparison nowadays but since it is small dpi isn't so bad.

Reviews.Title: samsung Galaxy phone
Reviews.Author: jim    Gadson
Reviews.Content: I love this  phone no problem I have one just like it  with damage len Ibought this one use and it work great

Reviews.Title: This is not a real Galaxy S 4G
Reviews.Author: Sandyd
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for some one as a gift because I have one of my own and I love it. Comparing this phone to mine I could tell that it was a bootleg version. The packaging was a generic Samsung box,  the cords were completely different from the ones I have, and it doesn't come preloaded with the movie Inception like it's supposed to. The phone was obviously used and did not have the original back piece even though the description says it's new. Within a week the phone had problems with the apps working properly. This phone was a piece of junk. Do not purchase!!! It is not worth the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Not what I wanted
Reviews.Author: L. David Waterbury
Reviews.Content: Returned to vendor.  This phone is the original Samsung Galaxy, and not what expected.  I want the S-4  not the S (4g).  They could have made this clear in description of item.  Phone returned and received by Vendor last Wednesday.  Haven'y heard anything back.  David

Reviews.Title: Usb bad
Reviews.Author: HOP
Reviews.Content: i can charge it via usb but i can't exchange data between the port, i plan to use it overseas i can't cause i can't unlock it via usb port

Reviews.Title: Horrible Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: tomboy68
Reviews.Content: This phone should be taken off the market. It's HORRIBLE! I've gone through two of them and they just don't work.
